article_title: Is Your Doctor Being Paid By Pharma? That Could Be Good.

article_metadata.author: John LaMattina

og.description: The biopharmaceutical industry seeks out the best doctors to work with on these important clinical programs. After all, these trials can cost anywhere from $10 – 500 million and one can’t afford suboptimal trial design or execution. Thus, a company tries to involve the best experts for the particular disease for which the experimental medicine is intended.
